availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac McRoberts and Polly McRoberts. Carpenter in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District no. 2, p. 281B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 29.
Find A Grave, "Edwin McRoberts (1818-1892)," Memorial #94011148, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94011148 (accessed November 28, 2018).
